original_text: And the officers of the children of Israel, which Pharaoh's taskmasters had set over them, were beaten, and demanded, Wherefore have ye not fulfilled your task in making brick both yesterday and to day, as heretofore?
korean_text: 바로의 감독들이 자기들이 세운 바 이스라엘 자손의 기록원들을 때리며 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 어제와 오늘에 만드는 벽돌의 수효를 전과 같이 채우지 아니하였느냐 하니라

sentences.original_text: And the officers of the children of Israel
which Pharaoh's taskmasters had set over them
sentences.korean_translation: 바로의 감독들이 그들 위에 세웠던 자들이

sentences.original_text: Wherefore have ye not fulfilled your task
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 너희가 너희의 과업을 이행하지 않았느냐

sentences.original_text: in making brick both yesterday and to day
